title: Drawing, "Design for a Billiard Table", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and ink, yellow wash on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Plan and elevation of a billiard table, with six tapering and fluted legs. Side of table decorated with wall of Troy motif. Scale on left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Billiard Table", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and ink, yellow wash on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-480.
